memberdef.name: GTEST_PRED3_
memberdef.initializer: GTEST_ASSERT_( \ ::testing::AssertPred3Helper(#pred, #v1, #v2, #v3, pred, v1, v2, v3), \ on_failure)

memberdef.name: GTEST_PRED_FORMAT4_
memberdef.initializer: GTEST_ASSERT_(pred_format(#v1, #v2, #v3, #v4, v1, v2, v3, v4), on_failure)

memberdef.name: EXPECT_PRED_FORMAT4
memberdef.initializer: GTEST_PRED_FORMAT4_(pred_format, v1, v2, v3, v4, GTEST_NONFATAL_FAILURE_)

memberdef.name: EXPECT_PRED4
memberdef.initializer: GTEST_PRED4_(pred, v1, v2, v3, v4, GTEST_NONFATAL_FAILURE_)

memberdef.name: ASSERT_PRED_FORMAT4

memberdef.name: ASSERT_PRED4
